0e99cdc19ed6b30de91eb79fe79287d09676ea03 4 4 2

author-time 1578994860
author-tz +1100
committer thoran
committer-mail <code@thoran.com>
committer-time 1579001829
committer-tz +1100
summary 0.8.0: Added the ability to handle symbols of the form :\w_\w and some weird edge case ones generally of the form :"" or :'' with or without _ or -.  Also added a Gemfile and Gemfile.lock.  Finally, I made it so that tests can be run from any directory.
